data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Nangarhar against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nangarhar, Afghanistan

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Nangarhar, Afghanistan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,701,429 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Nangarhar, Afghanistan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, make bold the prophets in Nangarhar, Afghanistan so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 270 believers in the state of Nangarhar the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Baloch, Western people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Nangarhar, Afghanistan to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Over 99.98 percent of the people of Nangarhar are far from Jesus.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Nangarhar, Afghanistan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
